nodes.text: Bantha-butter pancakes were a type of foodstuff. The pancake shared its name with the bantha, a species native to the planet Tatooine. Hondo Ohnaka compared the result of getting stepped on by the gigantic foot of a turlossus to being as flat as a bantha-butter pancake, a situation he witnessed on Dhandu 3 when two Pakiphantos in pursuit of him were flattened.
Bantha-butter pancakes were first mentioned in the canon junior novel Pirate's Price, which was written by Lou Anders and published in 2019.
